item.title: Alpha Metallurgical Resources Inc 10-K
item.description: Alpha Metallurgical Resources Inc, which is in the Bituminous Coal & Lignite Surface Mining [1221] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 07, 2022 had 54243 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: coal - 957 instances december - 493 instances 2021 - 486 instances 31 - 468 instances company - 448 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
